verses.verse: <S%G33>Come<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> you <S%G4145>rich,<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G3649>howl<s%> for your <S%G5004>miseries<s%> which are <S%G1904>coming<s%> upon you.
Your <S%G4149>riches<s%> have <S%G4595>rotted<s%> and your <S%G2440>garments<s%> have <S%G1096>become<s%> moth-eaten.

Your <S%G5557>gold<s%> and your <S%G696>silver<s%> have <S%G2728>rusted;<s%> and their <S%G2447>rust<s%> will be a <S%G3142>witness<s%> against you and will <S%G2068>consume<s%> your <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%> It is in the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> that you have <S%G2343>stored<s%> up your <S%G2343>treasure!<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G3408>pay<s%> of the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> who <S%G270>mowed<s%> your <S%G5561>fields,<s%> [and] which has been <S%G7504>withheld<s%> by you, <S%G2896>cries<s%> out [against you]; and the <S%G995>outcry<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2325>did<s%> the <S%G2325>harvesting<s%> has <S%G1525>reached<s%> the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G4519>Sabaoth.<s%>

You have <S%G5171>lived<s%> <S%G5171>luxuriously<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G4684>led<s%> a <S%G4684>life<s%> of <S%G4684>wanton<s%> <S%G4684>pleasure;<s%> you have <S%G5142>fattened<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts<s%> in a <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4967>slaughter.<s%>
You have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> and <S%G5407>put<s%> to <S%G5407>death<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> [man;] he does not <S%G498>resist<s%> you.

Be <S%G3114>patient,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G1092>farmer<s%> <S%G1551>waits<s%> for the <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G2590>produce<s%> of the <S%G1093>soil,<s%> being <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> it, <S%G2193>until<s%> it <S%G2983>gets<s%> the <S%G4291>early<s%> and <S%G3797>late<s%> rains.
You <S%G2532>too<s%> be <S%G3114>patient;<s%> <S%G4741>strengthen<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> for the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand.<s%>

Do not <S%G4727>complain,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> that you yourselves may not be <S%G2919>judged;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G2923>Judge<s%> is <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G4253>right<s%> at the <S%G2374>door.<s%>

As an <S%G5262>example,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> of <S%G2552>suffering<s%> and <S%G3115>patience,<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> we <S%G3106>count<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3106>blessed<s%> who <S%G5278>endured.<s%> You have <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G5281>endurance<s%> of <S%G2492>Job<s%> and have <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G5056>outcome<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>'s dealings, that the Lord is <S%G4184>full<s%> of <S%G4184>compassion<s%> and [is] <S%G3629>merciful.<s%>

But <S%G4253>above<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> do not <S%G3660>swear,<s%> <S%G3383>either<s%> by <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> by <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> with <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3727>oath;<s%> but let your <S%G3483>yes<s%> be <S%G3483>yes,<s%> and your <S%G3756>no,<s%> <S%G3756>no;<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that you may not <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>
Is <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G2553>suffering<s%>? Let him <S%G4336>pray.<s%> Is <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2114>cheerful<s%>? Let him <S%G5567>sing<s%> <S%G5567>praises.<s%>

Is <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G770>sick<s%>? Let him <S%G4341>call<s%> for the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>church,<s%> and let them <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> him, <S%G218>anointing<s%> him with <S%G1637>oil<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>

and the <S%G2171>prayer<s%> offered in <S%G4102>faith<s%> will <S%G4982>restore<s%> the one who is <S%G2577>sick,<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G1453>raise<s%> him up, and <S%G2579>if<s%> he has <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> they will be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him.

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> <S%G1843>confess<s%> your <S%G266>sins<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> and <S%G4336>pray<s%> for <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3704>so<s%> that you may be <S%G2390>healed.<s%> The <S%G1754>effective<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> of a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>man<s%> <S%G2480>can<s%> <S%G1754>accomplish<s%> <S%G4183>much.<s%>

<S%G2243>Elijah<s%> was a <S%G444>man<s%> with a <S%G3663>nature<s%> <S%G3663>like<s%> <S%G1473>ours,<s%> and he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G4335>earnestly<s%> that it might not <S%G1026>rain;<s%> and it did not <S%G1026>rain<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> for <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G1763>years<s%> and <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>
And he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> and the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G1325>poured<s%> <S%G5205>rain,<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G985>produced<s%> its <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>
My <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G4105>strays<s%> from the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1994>turns<s%> him <S%G1994>back,<s%>

let him <S%G1097>know<s%> that he who <S%G1994>turns<s%> a <S%G268>sinner<s%> from the <S%G4106>error<s%> of his <S%G3598>way<s%> will <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>soul<s%> from <S%G2288>death,<s%> and will <S%G2572>cover<s%> a <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>
